summary: The frost and storm atronachs are ugly. So I decided to replace them with a wispmother and a spriggan matron, respectedly.
descriptionHtml:
[center]ALTERNATE ATRONACHS[/CENTER]

Available in the Steam workshop as well! 

My other mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8826]Better Fitting Gloves[/url]


[color=red]STANDALONE VERSION[/color]

Many of you wanted it, so there you go! The spelltomes are found near the whiterun entrance, and I have loaded a screenshot pointing you where to go. Based on slayer\'s app from the steam workshop.

--------------------------------
Info
------------------
This mod replaces the boring original creatures with much cooler creatures. All spell tomes in the game that refer to frost and storm atronachs now summon a wispmother and a spriggan matron, including the thrall versions.
Both cast their own spells, which means you now have exploding wisps and swarms of bugs on your side!
NPCs still summon the vanilla creatures. Haha stinks for them.
WARNING: this may be really OP at lower levels lol.

Installation
---------------
Just drop the .esp file in the data folder and youre good to go!

Unistall by deleting the sprigganandwispmother.esp file.

Leave comments if you have any problems or bugs to report.


Thank you creation kit for making this easy to do!
author: Feather Grey
